description:
In this course titled ' Hypnosis – Overcome Guilt Using Self Hypnosis.' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

  • Why guilt feeling arises?
  • How the feeling of guilt affects you?
You will also learn powerful self hypnosis , relaxation , mind trigger and timeline techniques to overcome your past guilt which is affecting your present life mentally.

All of us have some guilt or the other in our life which we had committed in the past . It could be cheating someone, doing something sinful , hurting a close one etc . We need to forgive our self and move on from the feeling of guilt to achieve higher success and live peacefully in the present.

Using these techniques you will be able to identify your guilt feeling and overcome it easily and live happily .

This course is for everyone who are mentally disturbed because of the guilty feeling they have in their mind

This course contains more than 30 minutes of video content designed over 8 lectures in English.

This course contains-

Lecture1:Introduction

Lecture2:Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture3:Conscious Mind Vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture4:How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture5:How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture6:Identify Your Guilt Closely

Lecture7:Summary

Lecture 8: Bonus Exercise - Uncovering The Cause And Developing Confidence
title: Hypnosis – Overcome Guilt Using Self Hypnosis
